summary: This document is an email correspondence between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding financial consulting services. Kahn expresses a desire to discuss financial needs and investment solutions, highlighting the personalized service and support offered by Markland as a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is a Senior Financial Consultant at HBRK Associates, who is reaching out to discuss financial needs and investment solutions.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland is a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade, providing personalized financial guidance and support to clients.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is seeking financial consulting services from Chad Markland, who is offering personalized investment guidance.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn missed a scheduled meeting with Chad Markland and suggested rescheduling for the next day.
Chad Markland emphasizes his role in understanding and guiding clients through their financial needs.
The correspondence highlights the personalized service and support offered by TD Ameritrade.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.
